alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:42AM EST until December 19 at 2:37AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Esopus Creek at Cold Brook. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 13.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Esopus Creek Cold Brook Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 3 am: 7.1 Forecast: Mon 7 am 11.8 Mon 1 pm 13.9 Mon 7 pm 11.7 Tue 1 am 9.1 Tue 7 am 8.0 Tue 1 pm 7.5 Tue 7 pm 7.1 Wed 1 am 6.8 Wed 7 am 6.5 &&
